domainTest.title: Domain Test
domainTest.description: Enter the domain you want to check to see which DNS servers can resolve it successfully.
domainTest.noUsableDns: Unfortunately, no usable DNS server was found.
domainTest.checkInternet: Please check your internet connection and try again.
domainTest.allDnsAvailable: All checked DNS servers are available.
domainTest.invalidDomainError: Please enter only the domain name (e.g., google.com)
